declare_module(rtf2html)

set(MODULE_SRC
    common.h
    config.h
    dbg_iter.h
    fmt_opts.cpp
    fmt_opts.h
    rtf2html.cpp
    rtf_keyword.cpp
    rtf_keyword.h
    rtf_table.cpp
    rtf_table.h
    rtf_tools.h
    )

setup_module()

target_no_warning(${MODULE} -Wno-conversion)
target_no_warning(${MODULE} -Wno-deprecated-declarations)
